title: Always Beginning

panel_structure.description: Wide shot showing all locations simultaneously - forest, void, threshold - existing in superposition around Evan and Architect
Medium shot of their hands almost touching, creating ripples that transform the environment with each near-contact
Close on their eyes reflecting infinite doorways, each containing another conversation, another journey beginning

transformation_notes: The final scene suggests this ending is just another beginning - the conversation continues beyond the page
dialogue_rhythm: Circular, ending where it began but transformed
